section: Client acknowledges and agrees that all due dates set forth in the Scope of Work are guaranteed by the Company, regardless of whether the company receives required materials, documentation, or approvals in a timely fashion from the client. Delays will not affect the due dates.
explanation: This section states that due dates are guaranteed by the Company regardless of whether the company receives required materials from the client, therefore delays will not affect the due dates. This is contradictory because the company cannot guarantee the due dates if the client does not provide required materials. It is impossible for the company to guarantee due dates if it is waiting on the client to send necessary documents.

section: Client shall make a prepayment of $1,900 and pay the remaining $3,100 on completion of the Scope of Work. However, the Client can pay the remaining amount at any time, or in multiple installments, before the Scope of Work completion.
explanation: The first sentence of this section states the client shall pay the remaining $3,100 on completion of the Scope of Work. The second sentence states the client can pay the remaining amount at any time, or in multiple installments, before the Scope of Work completion. These sentences contradict each other because the first one states that the remaining payment is due on completion of the scope of work, but the second states the client can pay at any time before completion.

section: Company is obligated to continue providing Customer Service throughout the duration of this agreement, and may not alter or cease providing Customer Service. Company at its sole discretion may at any time alter or cease providing the Customer Service which it has agreed to provide to Client relating to Client Website pursuant to this Agreement without any liability to Company.
explanation: The first sentence of this section states that the company is obligated to continue providing customer service throughout the duration of this agreement, and may not alter or cease providing Customer Service. The second sentence states the company at its sole discretion may at any time alter or cease providing the Customer Service which it has agreed to provide to Client pursuant to this Agreement without any liability to Company. These sentences contradict each other because the first one states the company may not alter or cease providing customer service, but the second states the company can alter or cease providing customer service at any time.
